00070 class DebugStream {
00072     std::ostream& stream;
00073     
00075     short level;
00076     
00077   public:
00078     DebugStream(std::ostream &_stream, short _debug_level = 1)
00079         : stream(_stream), level(_debug_level) 
00080     {}
00081     
00082     template <class T>
00083     inline DebugStream& operator<<(const T &val) {
00084         if (MINET_DEBUGLEVEL >= level) {
00085             stream << val;
00086         }
00087         return *this;
00088     }
00089     
00090     inline DebugStream& operator<<(std::ostream& (*val)(std::ostream&)) {
00091         if (MINET_DEBUGLEVEL >= level) {
00092             stream << val;
00093         }
00094         return *this;
00095     }
00096     
00097     inline DebugStream& operator()(short new_level) {
00098         level = new_level;
00099         return *this;
00100     }
00101 };
